definition: abbr. for Afghanistan 阿富汗[A1 fu4 han4]
prefix used before monosyllabic names, kinship terms etc to indicate familiarity/used in transliteration/also pr. [a4]
perspiration/sweat/CL:滴[di1],頭|头[tou2],身[shen1]/to be speechless (out of helplessness, embarrassment etc) (Internet slang used as an interjection)
see 可汗[ke4 han2], 汗國|汗国[han2 guo2]

sentences.english: Afghanistan's Second Vice President Abdul Karim Khalili was present at the meeting as guest of the host country.
sentences.chinese: 阿富汗第二副總統哈利利作爲東道國客人出席會議。

sentences.english: A document from their meeting said the situation in Afghanistan is deteriorating.
sentences.chinese: 外長會議的一份文件說阿富汗的局勢正在惡化。

sentences.english: They also welcomed the decision to cancel the run-off election.
sentences.chinese: 他們也對阿富汗取消決選表示歡迎。

sentences.english: Eight-year old Akram plays marbles with his friends in south of Kabul, capital of Afghanistan, in Nov. 2010.
sentences.chinese: 月，在阿富汗首都喀布爾，阿克拉姆與朋友們玩兒球。

sentences.english: An Afghan hound stands at attention.
sentences.chinese: 一隻阿富汗獵犬昂首肅立。

sentences.english: The current conflict might become another drawn-out disaster, like the ones in Afghanistan and Iraq.
sentences.chinese: 目前的戰爭可能會跟伊拉克戰爭阿富汗戰爭一樣長久。

sentences.english: Massoud denies taking money out of Afghanistan.
sentences.chinese: 馬蘇德否認自己曾帶錢離開阿富汗。

sentences.english: In fact, we import more gasoline into Afghanistan than any other product.
sentences.chinese: 事實上，我們從阿富汗進口最多的物資就是汽油。

sentences.english: The country has around 4, 250 troops in the country.
sentences.chinese: 德國目前在阿富汗約有4250名駐軍。

sentences.english: An Afghan worker cuts firewood to light a brick kiln in Kabul.
sentences.chinese: 在喀布爾，一阿富汗工人削木柴，以點燃磚窯。

sentences.english: The songs on this album became popular hits and were broadcast on television and radio station throughout Afghanistan.
sentences.chinese: 專輯歌曲如此暢銷，阿富汗全國電視電臺紛紛播送。

sentences.english: Following Afghan tradition, local commanders are building independent fiefs that they will be reluctant to relinquish.
sentences.chinese: 按照阿富汗的傳統，當地的指揮官都願意自立王國。

sentences.english: Traditionally fighting escalates in Afghanistan as the weather turns warmer.
sentences.chinese: 在阿富汗，隨着氣候的轉暖，戰鬥就會升級。

sentences.english: Source Galbanum is an umbelliferous plant that grows in Iran and Afghanistan.
sentences.chinese: 白松香是傘形科植物，長於伊朗和阿富汗。

sentences.english: Just now, Afghanistan needs foreign troops to undertake COIN.
sentences.chinese: 眼下，阿富汗依然需要外國軍隊進行平叛。

sentences.english: He said this has affected Afghanistan - the first "hot" ground war in NATO history.
sentences.chinese: 他說，這個事實直接影響到阿富汗戰場。

definition: variant of 索馬里|索马里[Suo3 ma3 li3]/Somalia
Chechnya, a republic in southwestern Russia/Chechen
